entries.title: Connect 4
entries.description: My first project completed as part of the General Assembly SEI Remote course. I decided to stick to my original guns and build a game.

entries.title: Rosetta Send
entries.preview: Rock Climbing Route database. MERN stack, custom JWT auth.
entries.description: I built Rosetta Send as an homage to my love and pursuit of elite sport climbing. The app allows a user to add a route, of any name/type/grade/location, which can then be searched by anybody using the built in Route Finder. The user can also view their profile of submitted climbs, and delete their account if they choose to. It is a full CRUD, MERN stack application. I began building this during my time with General Assembly.

entries.title: JS Cave Generator
entries.description: I used to play with cave generation back a few years ago when I developed games as a hobby. I decided to revive my love for RNG and algorithm by creating a 2D 'platformer style cave', using a basic level of Cellular Automaton. Would be cool to code a little man to jump around this sometime.

entries.title: JS Fizz Buzz
entries.description: Generic Fizz Buzz, can specify a range of numbers to check Fizz Buzz on.
